name: PaytmMall-Clone
description: It was a team project.We implemented some product sorting and filtering features, We used local storage for data handling and implemented signup, login, individual product page, category-wise page, address input, cart, checkout page, etc.

name: Himalaya Clone
description: This is the first ever individual project built by me during construct week at Masai School And I implemented some product sorting and filtering features. I used local storage for data handling, And also implemented signup, login, individual product page, category-wise page, address input, cart, checkout page, etc.

name: Mini-Food-Application
